name: Cut the Cards
description:
My entry for the Mini Jam 69: Hell. You play as the grim reaper, who has decided to start a card collection, so he must now go through the fields of the damned in hell to reap the cards. A hack and slash game, collect all the cards, not much else to it, some of the cards will fight back though, so be wary.

Update 1.02:

  • Player hit animation fixed.
  • Better camera angle
  • Enemies have a close range attack
  • A bit more variety in enemies, a mix of just melee enemies, just turret enemies and both
  • Controller controls not inverted
  • Shift gives the player a speed boost
  • Movement after death should be fixed
  • Sound effects in game now
  • Fixed collision errors
  • Animation a bit more responsive
  • Code a bit more optimised
  • Post processing, this is used to separate 3 areas, explore to find them... they're not subtle
  • More particle effects, enemy attacks
  • Healing areas, four of them, separated by suit.
  • A few minor bug fixes
